subject: Re: [PATCH v4 31/31] mm: lru: add VM_WARN_ON_ONCE_FOLIO to lru maintenance helpers

reviews.author: Qi Zheng (author)
reviews.summary: The reviewer suggested refactoring the code to reparent LRU folios and their corresponding objcgs together, holding both locks for each node to avoid potential issues.

reviews.author: Shakeel Butt
reviews.summary: Shakeel Butt reviewed the patch series and provided feedback on several patches, including suggesting improvements to code style, fixing a few issues, and providing Acked-by tags. In Message 5, he raised concerns about acquiring locks for all nodes together in one patch.

reviews.author: Usama Arif
reviews.summary: The reviewer raised a concern that the patch might break lockdep on more than 4 NUMA nodes due to acquiring two locks per node.

reviews.author: Harry Yoo
reviews.summary: Reviewer Harry Yoo pointed out a type mismatch in the nr_pages parameter of mem_cgroup_update_lru_size() and requested it be changed to long.
